CustomField.description: Use this option to change the section body style of survey responder interface. Use standard CSS style. e.g. background-color: #445566 !important;border-radius:20px;border: 3px solid #ff0000;font-size: 20px.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Body Style allows you to customize the visual style of the section body in the survey responder interface. You can use this option to apply CSS styles. e.g. background-color: #445566 !important;border-radius:20px;border: 3px solid #ff0000;font-size: 20px.
CustomField.label: Section Body Style
